title: 自定义局域网连线IP
author: sansum1213
txt_content:
[ModLoader][1.3.1][v1.1] Custom LAN Server IP & Port [1325+ Downloads]原網
这个MOD可以开局域网时自定义IP，可以修改成hamachi或实体ip供朋友连线

可是只出到1.3.1版本，有人发现类似功能的MOD吗





2012-08-29_03.43.03.png (120.71 KB, 下载次数: 11)

replies.author: mot321
replies.txt_content: 2. Don't forget to delete the META-INF folder.................{:10_492:}

replies.author: yeyaowei
replies.txt_content: 要是有1.3.2多好，Bukkit内存大，用没装MOD不能自定义端口，端口变来变去的..所以快点出1.3.2！！
